name: Final Fantasy XI: Seekers of Adoulin
name_original: Final Fantasy XI: Seekers of Adoulin
description:
Final Fantasy XI: Seekers of Adoulin is an action-RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 26-03-2013. Square Enix published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
You can play Final Fantasy XI: Seekers of Adoulin on PC and PlayStation 2.
It was produced by Akihiko Matsui and Hiromichi Tanaka. Akihiko Matsui, Koichi Ishii, Koichi Ogawa and Mizuki Ito directed the game. It was scored by Kumi Tanioka, Naoshi Mizuta and Nobuo Uematsu.
